testcase.name: Search Customer by EMailID
testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customers Menu...........................................passed And Enter customer eMail....................................................passed When Click on search button.................................................passed Then User should found Email in the Search table............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given User Launch Chrome browser............................................passed When User opens URL "http://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login"...............passed And User enters Email as "admin@yourstore.com" and Password as "admin"......passed And Click on Login..........................................................passed Then User can view Dashboard................................................passed When User click on customers Menu...........................................passed And Enter customer FirstName................................................passed And Enter customer LastName.................................................passed When Click on search button.................................................passed Then User should found Name in the Search table.............................passed And close browser...........................................................passed
